@generaltao it directly compares to FF12 and Xenoblade in my mind, and i like it way better than either of those.
@generaltao even if you "fast travel" the load times make it slow. But I love the combat and the scale of everything.
@generaltao it's definitely rough around the edges but I'm pretty obsessed. Main complaint is that there's a lot of time lost to commute
